DialogueOption.Text: I dived into the waterways and found a Nomai mural depicting Hearthian ancestors on land.
Hey, Moraine. Slate said you had something to ask before I fly off?

Dialogue.Page: Oh, that.. Um, I just wanted to make a silly request if it's okay, astronaut.
Do you remember that time Riebeck dropped their banjo into one of the geysers by accident? They were so worried and sad they had lost that banjo..
Apparently, there wasn't any trace of the banjo after they grabbed their suit and jumped down after it. I was kind of spooked when I first heard this story..
But days later, Riebeck found out the banjo had shot out one of the geyser mountains on the other side of the planet! Gneiss said it was a miracle.
But ever since that incident, I've always been curious about what might be inside those geysers.
There's gotta be some massive underwater cave system connected between the geysers for the banjo to have been carried so far from the village.
Who knows how far they wind, or what we might find down there! I feel excited just thinking about it..
I wanted to jump down there and swim around myself, but Mayor Rutile says I'll drown if I do that, so I should ask one of the astronauts to help me look instead.
So... Um, could you maybe.. <Pause> jump in one of the geysers and look around if there's anything cool in Timber Hearth's spooky depths for me, astronaut?

DialogueOption.Text: That sounds dangerous! I'll give it a try sometime.
I dived down there and found a Nomai mural of our Hearthian ancestors!

Dialogue.Page: Really? You're the best, astronaut!
If you do find anything, I wanna hear all about it!
Just be careful not to hit your head right before your takeoff, okay?
Woah.. What? A Nomai mural of.. our ancestors on land? ..That’s awesome!
It’s not some secret underwater monster like I was hoping.. But it’s still really awesome!
But wait... <Pause> Doesn’t that mean Hearthians must have already existed when the Nomai were around?
And it sounds like we were still able to live on both land and water back then!
Man, when did Hearthians stop being able to breathe underwater completely then? If we were still able to breathe underwater nowadays, I'd be able to swim around the waterways all day!
But wow.. Isn't this discovery gonna totally upend our knowledge of Hearthian history?
I think you’d better fly to Brittle Hollow as soon as you can to tell Riebeck about this huge discovery, astronaut!
They're probably going to lose their marbles revising the Hearthian history books.
Don’t forget, you can use your signalscope to track down the other travelers more easily!

DialogueOption.Text: Hey, Moraine. Slate said you had something to ask before I fly off?
I dived into the waterways and found a Nomai mural depicting Hearthian ancestors on land!
